name: Mozambique International Mining & Energy Conference and Exhibition
content: The 9th edition of Mozambique International Mining & Energy Conference and Exhibition, MMEC 2023, will take place from 26-27 April 2023 in Maputo, Mozambique. MMEC 2023 will be the 9th edition of one of the largest and longest-running business events in Mozambique, drawing participation from government and corporate leaders to focus on the countryâ€™s mining, oil and gas and energy sectors. The event will take place in the context of ever-shifting global resource and energy markets following the likely long-term impact of the COVID pandemic and its aftermath as well as the geopolitical crisis stemming from the Russia-Ukraine conflict. MMEC 2023 will unite key decision-makers across government and industry and expects to attract over 500 professionals offering quality business connections to the leaders and dealmakers in the mining and energy sectors.
